content: It will enable Teck Metals to unlock the value of our world-class copper growth portfolio and capitalize on the opportunities created by the energy transition funded by steelmaking coal cash flows during the transition period and position EVR as a pure-play high-margin steelmaking coal producer with exposure to strong steel fundamentals and a significant equity value appreciation potential, fruition potential as the transition capital structure is paid. Teck Metals, this is about unlocking the value of the world-class copper growth portfolio and capitalizing on the opportunities presented by the energy transition continuing to be funded by steelmaking coal cash flows through the transmission period.
